title: Easy Money
lyrics:
I don't doubt
Somebody's working harder now
I do doubt
That it all comes back around somehow
This is easy money

It's easy money

So why'd you worry?

Nothing but love for it

Easy money



Treat me nice

Nobody's looking bad up here

Then I ask you polite

So I don't say no and I don't think twice

Why should I worry?

Worry makes you ill

Ornament my body

Cause I like how it makes me feel



This is easy money

It's easy money

(Never enough of it)

Easy money



Worry makes you ill

Stay, still

Now I can have my fill

So I will



Throwing out the pill

Throwing out the pill

Throwing out the pill

That's enough

That's enough

That's enough



This is easy money

It's easy money

Never enough of it

Never enough of it

Easy money

Never enough of it

Never enough

Never enough of it...
